授業目的:
This course builds on the communication skills that were covered in the spring semester. Students will improve their speaking and listening ability through a variety of activities, including listening and note-taking, making recordings, shadowing, and giving presentations. These are the goals:

• To equip students with English speaking and listening skills
• To provide students with guidance and practice in basic conversation
• To develop students’ academic listening, speaking and presentation skills
到達目標:
In the fall semester we will continue to use the same learning goals as in the spring.

1. Group Discussion Skills
a. Expressing ideas, asking for information or clarification
b. Giving reasons, evaluating ideas
c. Agreeing and disagreeing
d. Communication strategies
e. Negotiation strategies
f. Debate strategies

2. Presentation/Speaking Skills
a. Speech preparation and practice
b. Speech delivery
c. Speaking fluency, pronunciation, and intonation
